movie.title: Good Will Hunting
movie.actors: Matt Damon, Robin Williams, Ben Affleck, Stellan Skarsgard
movie.plot: A touching tale of a wayward young man who struggles to find his identity, living in a world where he can solve any problem, except the one brewing deep within himself, until one day he meets his soul mate who opens his mind and his heart.
movie.tomatoConsensus: It follows a predictable narrative arc, but Good Will Hunting adds enough quirks to the journey -- and is loaded with enough powerful performances -- that it remains an entertaining, emotionally rich drama.
